targets.rawSql: SELECT `teams`.`name` as 'team_name', SUM(`subquery`.`distance`) as 'distance', SUM(`subquery`.`steps`) as 'steps', SUM(`subquery`.`calories_burnt`) as 'calories_burnt' FROM teams, (SELECT `participants`.`team_id` as 'team_id', `participants`.`name`, MAX(`records`.`distance`) as 'distance', MAX(`records`.`steps`) as 'steps', MAX(`records`.`calories_burnt`) as 'calories_burnt' from `records` inner join `participants` ON `records`.`participant_id`=`participants`.`id` group by `records`.`participant_id`) subquery WHERE `teams`.`id` = `subquery`.`team_id` GROUP BY `subquery`.`team_id`
